name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix wrapping errors by @AkihiroSuda in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/196
* fs.CopyDir: support sockets and pipes by @AkihiroSuda in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/197
* CI: resolve Go path before sudoing ; Remove deprecated io/ioutil (except ioutil.ReadDir)  by @AkihiroSuda in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/198
* move cmd/continuity to its own go module by @thaJeztah in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/200
* update authors and mailmap by @thaJeztah in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/201
* Various small fix-ups by @thaJeztah in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/202
* Revert "go.mod: update dependencies" by @AkihiroSuda in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/205
* go.mod: update dependencies (take 2) by @AkihiroSuda in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/204


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/containerd/continuity/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Copy Windows file metadata by @gabriel-samfira in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/188
* Do not log errors before returning them by @kzys in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/191
* Build containerd/continuity on multiple Unix OSes by @kzys in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/190
* Update CI Go version to 1.17 by @estesp in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/192
* fs: use syscall.Timespec.Unix by @tklauser in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/193

## New Contributors
* @gabriel-samfira made their first contribution in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/188
* @kzys made their first contribution in https://github.com/containerd/continuity/pull/191

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/containerd/continuity/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2
